title: Ahri or Zed?
body: Just want to know your guys opinion on who is better ahri or zed.

replies.body: i think zed is better because zed is an assasin that does alot of damage at full build it could probably one shot someone if enemy does not have any armor but i think ahri is also a good champ because she can lure you under the tower by charm. zed i better because he can pop enemy champ with his ult.
eh, ahri can do some serious damage if she charms you, but Wean is right.

Ahri's ability deals magical damage, whereas Zed's ability deals physical damage.
I would say that Zed is better because he has escapes, he can make himself untargetable, switch places and deal more damage, he can make his opponent unaware of his actions while he is dealing them damage.
